details.remarks: Bridge approach washed away on 03-09-21 as reported by Assistant Executive Engineer, PWD, Dhekiajuli Territorial Road Sub-Division

details.name: Balughat road, Bhalukjharoni
details.remarks: Due to torrential rainfall the water from Mansiri River (under Chariduar revenue Circle) hit Balughat road at Bhalukjharoni Village, Mouza Haleswar on 05/09/2021 under Tezpur Revenue Circle. The road overtopped for a depth  of 30 cm (approx) from ch 495 m to ch 630 m and side beam along the toe line of road found eroded at some stretches within the ch from 515 m to Ch 580 m.

details.name: 1. Sukchar ghat to Hazirhat Road 2. Hatsingimari to Kokradanga Road.
details.location: 1.Side berm and protection work of Sukchar Ghat to Hazirhat Road has damaged due to flood and heavy rain. 2. Side berm side slope and road formation of Hatsingimari to Kokradanga Road damaged due to heavy rain.
details.remarks: 1.Side berm and protection work of Sukchar Ghat to Hazirhat Road has damaged due to flood and heavy rain. 2. Side berm side slope and road formation of Hatsingimari to Kokradanga Road damaged due to heavy rain. Occurred on 02-09-2021, received from PWD information letter on 06-09-2021.

details.name: Br. No.35/1 of SH2 (Manas Bridge approach to Barpeta Medical college)
details.remarks:
Due to rising of water level  of Manas river at Br. No.35/1 of SH2 (Manas Bridge approach to Barpeta Medical college) East side bridge approach at up-stream one no. approach protection geo bag spur has damaged and another one no. of geo bag spur is washed out. (Damaged spur length18.00m and width2.00m, height2.50m and location coordinates 26.307388, 90.753872) (Approximate length of washed out spur20.00m, width3.00m and height2.50m)

According to report received from PWD(Roads) depptts. on 01/09/2021.
